Title: Bisik pada langit
Writer: Maizura Ederis (script), Saniboey Mohd Ismail (original story), Sofia J. Rhyland (script)
Actors: Jalil Hamid, Ummi Nazeera, Beto Kusyairy, Naim Daniel
Plot: Wak Selamat is the father of one Siti Hajar, who wishes to study abroad. As a father, Wak does everything he can in order to fulfill her dreams. Her two brothers are also more than willing ...
